about_the_game:
September 6th, 1888
Captain Carmi Ishmael wakes up to a knock on his door. A young man, Victor Franklin, demands a box from his cargo hold. Not knowing who this is, Ishmael sends him away, only to hear a gunshot from within his ship. Rushing to the cargo hold, Ishmael discovers that the man has stolen a box! Ishmael pursues, knowing his job is at risk, but very quickly learns that there is more to this man, and this box then meets the eye.

Take control of Ishmael in this supernatural point-and-click murder mystery prequel to Blood on the Thames. Track down Victor, and learn why a simple man would turn to such daring crimes…

content_descriptors.notes:
Blood and Blood magic is very present. Bodies that have been dismembered make an appearance. Prostitution is discussed but never depicted. There is an on-screen suicide.

Some other topics include racism and sexism in the context of 1888.

short_description: A murder mystery puzzle game with visual novel elements in a Gothic, Lovecraftian world. Collect clues, solve puzzles, interrogate suspects, and uncover the mystery surrounding the theft from The Mongolia in this prequel to the Blood on the Thames game.
